## MarkExtensionTags type

Provides the different mark groups which are defined in the mark extension specification.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MarkExtensionTags<GMarks extends string = string> = Record<MarkGroup, GMarks[]> & Record<string, undefined | GMarks[]>;
```
